name: ConceptMapR5DeviceUsageElementsForR4DeviceUseStatement
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 Resource `DeviceUsage` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `DeviceUseStatement`.
Element `DeviceUsage` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DeviceUseStatement`.
Element `DeviceUsage.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DeviceUseStatement.meta`.

Note that the target element context `DeviceUseStatement.status` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier.
Element `DeviceUsage.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DeviceUseStatement.status`.
Element `DeviceUsage.category` is will have a context of DeviceUseStatement based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `DeviceUseStatement`.

Element `DeviceUsage.context` is will have a context of DeviceUseStatement based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `DeviceUseStatement`.

Note that the target element context `DeviceUseStatement.timing[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `DeviceUseStatement`.
Element `DeviceUsage.timing[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DeviceUseStatement.timing[x]`.

Element `DeviceUsage.adherence.reason` is part of an existing definition because parent element `DeviceUsage.adherence` requires a cross-version extension.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `DeviceUsage.informationSource` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`.
Element `DeviceUsage.informationSource` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DeviceUseStatement.source`.
